text: Aur woh log jo duniya mein unki pairwi karte thay, kahenge ke kaash humko phir ek mauqa diya jata to jis tarah aaj yeh humse bezari zaahir kar rahey hain hum inse bezaar hokar dikha detey, yun Allah in logon ke woh aamaal jo yeh duniya mein kar rahey hain inke saamne is tarah layega ke yeh hasraton aur pashemaniyon ke saath haath malte rahenge, magar aag se nikalne ki koi raah na payenge
